TEAM_DESCRIPTION:
We are a strong technical team passionate about AI since 2016, with experience in multinational companies and public sector projects, across banking, education, large-scale logistics, and telecommunications.

We started this project in 2022, and since then, we've secured support from multiple investors and joined Techstars, one of the world’s leading startup accelerators.

We've delivered AI projects in a range of sectors, including a leading blockchain infrastructure provider and a prominent UK-based startup.

More recently, we've focused on the industrial sector, helping manufacturers improve operations through intelligent automation and data-driven decision-making.

CARD1.TITLE: Smart Solutions
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: We automate repetitive tasks and enhance workflows, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.

CARD2.TITLE: Easy Growth
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: Our solutions adapt to your business needs, enabling you to scale without complications.

CARD3.TITLE: Seamless Integration
CARD3.DESCRIPTION: We integrate AI into your operations effortlessly, ensuring efficiency without interruptions.

CARD1.TITLE: Let's discuss your project.
CARD1.SUBTITLE: Choose a time that works for you (scroll down).

CARD2.TITLE: Not ready for a call? Send us a message.
CARD2.SUBTITLE: We'll respond to you shortly, typically within an hour.

WHAT_WE_DO_SECTION.TITLE: What we stand for
WHAT_WE_DO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
We deliver tailored AI solutions that fit your business.
Our team analyzes your workflow and context to design personalized tools, enhancing operations without disruption.

Here are some examples of what we can achieve:

CARD1.TITLE:
Shared knowledge.
Smarter decisions.
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: No more relying on who remembers what.

CARD2.TITLE: Act before the opportunity slips away.
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: Stop wasting time on manual sales reports.

CARD4.TITLE:
Fast diagnostics.
Even remotely.
CARD4.DESCRIPTION: Take the guesswork out of maintenance.

CARD5.TITLE:
Operational data.
Instantly readable.
CARD5.DESCRIPTION: See what's really happening. In real time.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: All your company's knowledge
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: The answer might already exist inside your organization.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Your team's knowledge should not disappear when someone leaves.
Give everyone fast access to your organization's experience to make better decisions, solve problems, and learn from what worked before.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Knowledge is just one question away
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: No more relying on who remembers what.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Too much time is lost searching for documents or waiting for the right person to explain what was done before.

This solution changes that.

Ask a question and instantly access relevant information from past reports, records, or experiences. Valuable know-how stays available to everyone, exactly when it's needed.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for Expert Knowledge
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: The Right Knowledge, Always at Hand.
ITEMS_PILLS: Capture and share the expertise of your top team members.
Help new employees learn faster and ensure that essential knowledge remains accessible and relevant over time, regardless of who is on the team.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Act before the opportunity slips away
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Spot inactivity before it becomes a lost opportunity.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Don't let sales opportunities go unnoticed.

Identify inactive customers, analyze buying patterns and take action based on your own data.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Your pipeline, now crystal clear
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Stop wasting time on manual sales reports.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Responding to requests quickly and accurately means having the right context.

This solution lets you review previous quotes, compare pricing by client or market and generate tailored proposals in seconds using your existing templates.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for Sales Optimization
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Close More Deals, Faster.
ITEMS_PILLS: Stay informed and never miss an opportunity.
Get alerts when it's the right time to reach out to inactive clients.
And let the assistant find new leads for you — no hassle.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Professional proposals. No stress
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Build competitive proposals with confidence.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Quoting doesn't need to be slow or uncertain.

Check past proposals, compare prices and create consistent quotes based on real data.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Adjust pricing based on real-world data
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Faster quotes using the data you already have.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Responding to requests quickly and accurately means having the right context.

This solution lets you review previous quotes, compare pricing by client or market and generate tailored proposals in seconds using your existing templates.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for Budget Planning
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Decide Faster, Plan Better, Deliver with Confidence.
ITEMS_PILLS: Helps you create clearer budgets and plan more effectively.
Simulate scenarios, view real-time data, manage stock levels, and make sure nothing goes wrong with deliveries - all in minutes, not days.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Fast diagnostics. Even remotely
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Less downtime. More confidence.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
When something fails, every second counts.

Diagnose faster using past cases and get automatic recommendations to guide the next steps.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Take the guesswork out of maintenance
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Has it happened before? Find out in seconds.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Technical issues often cause delays because knowledge is scattered or unavailable.

This solution helps you identify similar past incidents, access test results and act quickly with data-based suggestions. It reduces downtime and supports smarter maintenance.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for More Efficient Maintenance
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Less Downtime. More Control.
ITEMS_PILLS: Get alerts about potential failures and see how similar issues were resolved in the past.
Support your team in preventing breakdowns and reducing costs with more efficient maintenance.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Operational data. Instantly readable
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: See what's really happening. In real time.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Turn complex data into clear visual insights.

Ask a question and get answers in seconds, without relying on reports or specialists.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Create powerful visuals in seconds
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Answer questions with charts, not reports.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Understanding what's really happening across operations should not require technical help.

This solution makes it easy to ask questions in natural language and receive visual answers from your data, making it easier to act, improve and decide.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for Insights with Dynamic Charts
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Understand what's happening, without wasting time.
ITEMS_PILLS: Turn simple questions into clear, visual answers, even when the data is complex or extensive.
Whether in production, quality, maintenance, or executive management, quickly analyze large volumes of information, identify patterns, and make informed decisions.
All in seconds, without relying on lengthy reports or technical analysis.

FOOTER.SLOGAN_SUBTITLE: Stay in touch with LYSIA Labs.
